summary: THE CHILD SEAT STRAPS DID NOT WORK.  *JB  THE MIDDLE SLOTS OF THE HARNESS STRAPS SEEMED LOOSE IN THE BACK, SO THE CONSUMER RETURNED THE CHILD SEAT IN EXCHANGE FOR A NEW ONE.  (SAME MODEL/COMMET TV)  THE SECOND CHILD SEAT STRAPS SEEMED TIGHT ENOUGH, UNTIL THE CONSUMER STRAPPED HER 3 YEAR OLD SON INTO THE HARNESS WHEN THE HARNESS STRAP PULLED AWAY FROM THE SEAT AND WAS NO LONGER ATTACHED TO THE RIGHT SIDE.  EVENFLO REPLACED THE CAR SEAT WITH THE APOLLO MODEL.  SCC
